name: Penthouse
description: Luxurious penthouses offering panoramic city views and top-notch amenities.

name: Beachfront properties
description: Exclusive properties located on pristine beaches, offering unparalleled ocean views and beach access.

name: Resorts
description: Luxury resorts nestled in tropical paradises, offering world-class amenities and personalized service.

name: Private islands
description: Exclusive private islands offering unparalleled privacy and luxury accommodations.

name: Villas
description: Stunning villas with spacious living areas, private pools, and breathtaking views.

name: Mansions
description: Exquisite mansions boasting luxurious interiors, expansive grounds, and state-of-the-art amenities.

name: Chalets
description: Cozy chalets nestled in picturesque mountain settings, offering stunning views and access to outdoor activities.

name: Castles
description: Historic castles steeped in grandeur and elegance, featuring opulent interiors and extensive grounds.

name: Estates
description: Sprawling estates offering a blend of luxury living and natural beauty, with manicured gardens and luxurious amenities.
